TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract OLEObject implements class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel._OLEObject, class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.OLEObjectEvents_Event

summary.span: Representa um controle ActiveX ou um objeto OLE incorporado ou vinculado em uma planilha.

span.span: Represents an ActiveX control or a linked or embedded OLE object on a worksheet.

summary.span: O objeto OLEObject é um membro da coleção.

span.span: The OLEObject object is a member of the collection.

summary.span: A coleção OLEObjects contém todos os objetos OLE de uma única planilha.

span.span: The OLEObjects collection contains all the OLE objects on a single worksheet.

para.span: This is a .NET interface derived from a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

span.span: This is a .NET interface derived from a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

para.span: Use this derived interface to access all method, property, and event members of the COM object.

span.span: Use this derived interface to access all method, property, and event members of the COM object.

para.span: However, if a method or event you want to use shares the same name under the same COM object, cast to the corresponding primary interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

span.span: However, if a method or event you want to use shares the same name under the same COM object, cast to the corresponding primary interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

para.span: Refer to this topic for information about the COM object.

span.span: Refer to this topic for information about the COM object.

para.span: Para obter informações sobre o método e os membros da propriedade do objeto COM, consulte .

span.span: For information about the method and property members of the COM object, see .

para.span: Use OLEObjects( ), onde é o nome ou número do objeto, para retornar um objeto OLEObject.

span.span: Use OLEObjects(), where is the name or number of the object, to return an OLEObject object.

para.span: As propriedades e os métodos do objeto OLEObject são duplicados em cada controle ActiveX de uma planilha.

span.span: The properties and methods of the OLEObject object are duplicated on each ActiveX control on a worksheet.

para.span: Isso permite o acesso a essas propriedades usando o nome do controle.

span.span: This enables access to these properties by using the control’s name.
